DOC.brief_summary: This research is a Randomized, double-blind, risperidone-controlled, multicenter clinical study. Chinese subjects with Ischemic Schizophrenia.
DOC.brief_title: Risperidone-controlled,Multicentre Clinical Trial of Iloperidone in Patients With Schizophrenia
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects will randomly enter into one of two groups,the period of treatment is 8 weeks.
DOC.criteria: men and women aged 18 to 65 years with schizophrenia; PANSS total score of at least 70 at screening and baseline; at least 2 more than 4 points in 7 of PANSSP; informed consent. allergy with iloperidone or risperidone; psychotic symptoms failing to improve after sufficient exposure to 2 antipsychotic treatment; any other primary Axis 1 psychiatric diagnosis; a history of alcohol or drug dependence in recent 1 year; at imminent risk of harm to self or others; systolic blood pressure≤90mmHg。
